thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com | 2 of 10
thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text:
Being our first Intrepid tour we were not too sure what to expect, as some details were hard to ascertain. I guessed this was because final arrangements were still being made. We had made an excellent choice as the itinerary was to our abilities and liking. The small group tour suits us well as you to tend to get good rapport with the guide and each other.
So we have since booked another tour with Intrepid, this time to the US National Parks, which we are anticipating greatly.
